constituent: mercy, double-mysterious, mothballs, horns, one, cocoon, heart, cocoon2
koohiiStory1: Here we see the DOUBLE-MYSTERIOUS Siamese twins again, at the MERCY of the machines that pump blood through their veins, since the single HEART they share won't do the job...
koohiiStory2: Here we see the DOUBLE-MYSTERIOUS Siamese twins again, at the MERCY of the machines that pump blood through their veins, since the single HEART they share won´t do the job...
